overview: After losing everything in the 9/11 attacks, an ordinary man will face his destiny by defying the unknown, in a sacred search for a 'Holy City', hidden somewhere in the lands of fire.
tagline: After losing everything in the 9/11 attacks, an ordinary man will face his destiny by defying the unknown, in a sacred search for a 'Holy City', hidden somewhere in the lands of fire.
title: The Sanctuary
